HTMLElementOl.summary: The <ol> HTML element represents an ordered list of items â€” typically rendered as a numbered list.

remarks.para:
-Other list-related HTML Elements: ul, li, menu
-CSS properties that may be specially useful to style the <ol> element:-the list-style property, to choose the way the ordinal displays
-CSS counters, to handle complex nested lists
-the line-height property, to simulate the deprecated compact attribute
-the margin property, to control the list indentation
